articles.author: WSJ
articles.title: US Navy destroys boats controlled by Iran-backed militias in Red Sea | Mint - Mint
articles.description: American forces were responding to the latest in a series of attacks launched by Houthi rebels against commercial ships over the course of the war in Gaza.
articles.content: A U.S. Navy vessel destroyed three boats carrying pro-Iranian Yemeni rebels after they attacked a Danish-owned container ship early Sunday, the latest in a string of assaults that have disrupted mari… [+7941 chars]
